text: It has come down to a #FF if you want to #GetVaccinated in #Canada. ICYMI @VaxHuntersCan is doing a fantastic job of nationally reporting (in real-time!) calling out where you can get your #COVID19 #vaccine if eligible. #VaccinesSaveLives #CdnHealth #VaccineShortage #FollowFriday https://t.co/9qFIXnssyF
